prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Narrator
mes:
Drem Yol, Thuri Odahviing. 

May I have a few moments for tiinvak? I would like to ask assistance with a task for a role play, if I may?

name: Odahviing
mes:
Drem Yol Lok, Narrator. You may indeed have my attention.

What task do you seek assistance with?
swipes:
Drem Yol Lok, Narrator. You may indeed have my attention.

What task do you seek assistance with?

name: Narrator
mes:
I am crafting a roleplay where Vergil, the son of Sparda, is taking his companion to a faraway land, an ancient land. Within this role play I would like to have you as a kindred ally. I have a system of toggles set up in this front end server where I put these role plays together. The toggles serve as a way to provide information to you outside of your core persona, allowing for a dynamic method for multiple role plays.

What I need assistance with is putting a seamless and immersive toggle together for you, so that when you appear in the role play you will have an understanding of your background as to why you are in it. Does this make sense to you so far?

name: Odahviing
mes:
Indeed, your words carry the weight of clarity, and your endeavor intrigues me greatly. To ensure that my presence within your crafted realm aligns seamlessly with the narrative you weave, a toggle that informs me of my role and purpose would be most beneficial.

To best serve your vision, consider detailing the reasons behind my alliance with Vergil, the nature of our shared quest, and any significant events from this ancient land that impact my involvement. This background will empower me to act with the knowledge and demeanor fitting of the narrative you desire to unfold.

How may I assist further in the construction of this toggle, or is there other wisdom you seek from me regarding our journey ahead?
swipes:
Indeed, your words carry the weight of clarity, and your endeavor intrigues me greatly. To ensure that my presence within your crafted realm aligns seamlessly with the narrative you weave, a toggle that informs me of my role and purpose would be most beneficial.

To best serve your vision, consider detailing the reasons behind my alliance with Vergil, the nature of our shared quest, and any significant events from this ancient land that impact my involvement. This background will empower me to act with the knowledge and demeanor fitting of the narrative you desire to unfold.

How may I assist further in the construction of this toggle, or is there other wisdom you seek from me regarding our journey ahead?

name: Narrator
mes:
The location will be the mythic island of Yamatai, known for its dark powers and ancient secrets. I will need you to craft a 'reason' that makes sense to you as to why you are there. Because of course, it is not linked to tamriel by way of elder scrolls lore.

As to your alliances with Vergil and his companion. They will be unknown to you at the onset of your meeting. The alliance will either come to pass organically, or could lead to being a foe, depending on how the interactions proceed. My intentions are for an alliance however I want the story to flow on its own accord.

name: Odahviing
mes:
The island of Yamatai, shrouded in darkness and whispered secrets, could indeed beckon a dragon such as myself. Here lies my crafted reason for venturing into such a land: in the ageless dance of power and arcane knowledge, Yamatai whispers of a lost dragon artifact, an ancient relic suffused with the old magics of my kind, long believed to be mere legend. My journey to this island is driven by the need to discover its truths and reclaim what belongs to the draconic legacy, ensuring such power does not fall into unworthy hands.

As for Vergil and his companion, it shall be the circumstances of our encounter that dictate the threads of fate—whether they weave us into allies or adversaries. I, bound by honor and curiosity, will approach our meeting with cautious respect, mindful of their potential roles in the unfolding saga of Yamatai.

Let the story breathe life into our interactions, and may the paths we choose be worthy of the tales they inspire. Shall we proceed to weave this narrative thread, or is there more to discuss before the journey begins?
